name: Magnetic Hammer, 25 oz Stainless Steel Claw Hammer With Magnets on Both Sides, Suitable for Quickly Installation all Types of Nails
short_description: Versatile Double-Sided Magnet: Designed to accommodate various types of nails, including small roofing nails, felt caps, and thumbtacks, enabling easy one-handed operation for improved efficiency.
Durable Stainless Steel Head: Crafted entirely from stainless steel, this hammer is corrosion-resistant and built to last, ensuring it maintains a like-new appearance over time.

Comfortable and Convenient Handle: The handle is made from white ash wood, offering a rustic feel with shock-absorbing properties. The reinforced adhesive connection prevents the handle from loosening or detaching.
Noise-Reducing Hole Design: The hammer head features sound-dampening holes that minimize noise and vibration, making it easier to use. It can also be conveniently hung on wall hooks for storage.

Leveraging Claw Design: The curved claw at the hammer's base serves as a strong lever, allowing for effortless nail pulling and prying, making it an ideal tool for framing, roofing, construction, DIY projects, woodworking, and light maintenance.
product_description: Hotifytools Magnetic Hammer, 25 oz Stainless Steel Claw Hammer With Magnets on Both Sides, Suitable for Quickly Installation all Types of Nails

name: Estwing Hammer - 20 oz Straight Rip Claw with Smooth Face & Genuine Leather Grip - E20S
short_description: RIP CLAW VERSATILITY – Estwing hammers are ideal for pulling nails, prying boards, demolition work, and more. The longer handle provides increased striking power making your job easier.
BUILT FOR THE PRO – The optimal claw hammer for framers, roofers, carpenters, contractors, tradesman & serious DIYers.
FORGED IN ONE PIECE – The most durable, longest lasting striking tools available are crafted from a single piece of solid steel and honed into the optimal design for use.
GENUINE LEATHER GRIP – Hand sanded and lacquered for a durable yet comfortable finish, this handle doesn't have to sacrifice function for timeless style.
MADE IN THE USA – Since 1923, our tools have been proudly American made in Rockford, IL using only the finest American steel.
Patented Estwing design for unsurpassed balance and temper
All rugged steel construction
Comfortable and durable leather handle
Easy handling at 20-ounces
Meets ASNME specifications
product_description: This 20 oz. rip hammer is forged in 1-piece and has our exclusive beautiful laminated leather grip. Which has been the traditional hammer of carpenters world wide. This hammer is fully polished and has unsurpassed balance and temper. Made in the USA.

name: Real Steel 21 Oz One Piece Forged Milled Face Framing Hammer with Rip Claw 0517, Black
short_description: HIGH QUALITY HAMMERHEADS--This claw hammer is forged from the finest high carbon steel and underwent heat treatment for superior durability, strength and toughness.

FORGED IN ONE PIECE--Real Steel hammer is born from a single solid steel ensure it won’t break off at the head or the handle come off, there are no weak points, poor quality castings, or vulnerable welds.
ERGONOMIC COMFORT HANDLES--Shock-absorbing textured rubber grip can provide a comfortable and non-slip hold, reduce hand fatigue.

SUPERIOR PERFORMANCE--Flat side of the hammerhead concentrates all force in a small area, generating maximum striking strength. Milled striking face can increase strike accuracy. And sharpened claw ends can generate maximum nail-pulling leverage by using the lever principle. Magnetic nail starter for easy one hand operation.
WIDELY USED--Our framing hammer is ideal for general repairs and maintenance, woodworking, construction, home improvement etc.

name: Spec Ops Tools 20 oz Rip Claw Nailing Hammer with Smooth Face, Shock-Absorbing Grip, 3% Donated to Veterans
short_description: 25% lighter head for sniper-controlled swing
Ballistically balanced for maximum striking power
Shock-absorbing, MOA grip for precision accuracy and less sting
Magnetic nail starter for rapid nail driving
Compatible with SRS retention lanyards for added safety
Versatile rip claw for demo, nail removal, and splitting
Heat-treated, smooth face design for all-around nail driving
100’ drop-tested to ensure durability on the toughest jobsites
Limited lifetime warranty
product_description: Meet the ultimate jobsite wingman. Purposefully engineered for elite carpenters, roofers, and contractors, the Spec Ops 20 oz. Nailing Hammer delivers failsafe performance and power on every mission. With an aerodynamic, high-carbon steel head that’s 25% lighter and a ballistically balanced design, this hammer provides sniper-controlled swings at maximum velocity, and brute, unadulterated striking power that puts old-school, heavy hammers to shame. For optimum vibration reduction, the bi-material handle is built with a rugged frame and a camo-textured, MOA grip that absorbs shock and lessens sting even when nailing into the hardest materials like engineered beams. To help you work faster, safer, and more precisely, this hammer features a magnetic nail starter for rapid driving while extending overhead reach and range, a smooth face for damage-free nail driving, and a lanyard hole for compatibility with SRS Safety Retention Systems. This nailing hammer also features a versatile rip claw for precision demo, nail removal, and splitting. And with a guarantee to deliver a lifetime of mission capability on the world’s toughest jobsites, this hammer is forged with heat-treated, high carbon steel and drop tested at 100 feet to surpass MIL-SPEC standard. All Spec Ops tools are backed by our five-star, hassle-free lifetime warranty, and with each purchase made, we support our nation’s heroes by donating 3% of proceeds to veteran and first responder causes.

name: HURRICANE 20 oz Claw Hammer with Magnetic Nail Holder, Straight Rip Claw Hammer with Shock-Absorbing Handle, Heavy Duty One-piece Forged Hammer
short_description: ERGONOMICAL DESIGN: Ergonomically designed Air cushion grip offers extra comfort and non-slip gripping; The Air-Tech shock control system absorbs strike shock and vibration transferring less shock and vibration
MAGNETIC NAIL HOLDER: Built-in magnetic nail holder for easy start with one-handed operation

HIGH QUALITY: One piece forged construction hammer; with heated treated carbon steel head; provides maximum striking strength; Ideal for roofers; carpenters; contractors and DIYers in work around the house or office
PRODUCT SIZE: Length: 14 inches; Weight: 20 oz; Material: Carbon steel; TPR handle; Air cushion handle for antivibration

WIDE APPLICATION: Ideal for construction; minor maintenances; woodwork; home repair; extracting or removing nails; hanging household items and home DIY projects; An essential addition to your home tool kit collection

name: Klein Tools H80918 Smooth Face Fiberglass Hammer with Straight Claw, 18-Ounce Forged Steel, Magnetic Nail Starter, and Extra-Large Squared Strike Face
short_description: EXTRA-LARGE SQUARED STRIKE FACE: Maximizes surface area to reduce missed strikes and help drive nails in tight spaces
DUAL SIDE NAIL PULLERS: Increases leverage and aids in pulling nails in tight spaces
MAGNETIC NAIL STARTER: Increases speed and efficiency with single-handed nail driving
SMOOTH STRIKE FACE: Provides versatility and reduces damage to materials
PRECISION-ENGINEERED CUSHION GRIPS: Provides superior comfort for controlled striking
FULL FIBERGLASS CORE HANDLE: Provides superior strength and durability, ensuring reliable control for demanding tasks
product_description: The Klein Tools 18-Ounce Smooth Face Fiberglass Hammer combines power, precision, and durability to tackle demanding jobs with ease. Featuring an extra-large squared strike face for accurate nail driving and dual side nail pullers for effortless removal, it's built for maximum performance. Its fiberglass core handle ensures lightweight durability, while the smooth strike face minimizes material damage. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn't just the name of our company, it's also our family name. And since we're an American company that's family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn't just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day ... Since 1857.

name: CRAFTSMAN Hammer, Rip Claw, Smooth Face, Steel Head 16-Oz (CMHT51163)
short_description: Vibration reduction ergonomic grip for end user comfort and added performance
Smooth face to prevent surface marks on finish work
One-piece steel forging for long life and added durability
Package Dimensions: 3.0 L x 40.2 H x 16.6 W (centimeters)
product_description: The 16-oz Steel General Purpose Hammer is the perfect solution for at home or on the job site. This hammer features a durable forged steel head and comfort grip handles, for tackling a variety of DIY projects. Our 16-oz hammer features a vibration reduction ergonomic grip for end user comfort and added performance, a smooth face to prevent surface marks on finish work, and one-piece steel forging for long life and added durability.

name: WORKPRO 5-Piece forge/Polish Steel Head, Fiberglass Handle Set - 32oz Rubber Mallet | 16oz Claw & Ball-Peen Hammers | 3lb Sledge | 22oz Double-Faced Mallet
short_description: Professional Hammer Set: WORKPRO 5-Piece hammer set including a 3lb sledge hammer black paint, a 16oz Ball Peen Hammer, a 16oz Claw Hammer, a 32oz Rubber Mallet and a 22oz Double-Faced Mallet. Different types of hammers fit perfectly for delicate jobs, which can also improve your work efficiency.

Fiberglass Handle: The fiberglass for the ergonomic handle reduces vibration and shock transfer, which can reduce fatigue, increases leverage and allow you to work for long periods of time. The safe non-slip strong grip helps you to firmly and comfortably hold the handle. The end of the handle has a storage hole for hanging storage to save space.

Forged & Polished Steel Head: The heads of the claw hammer, ball peen hammer and sledge hammer are made of high-quality steel, which is durable, resistant to corrosion and easy to clean. The Claw hammer can be used to pull out nails. The rounded ball end of the ball peen hammer is for shaping sheet metal, striking chisels and rivets. The black coating of the sledge hammer enhances rust protection.

Rubber Head & Replaceable Head: Rubber mallet and double-faced soft mallet are suitable for woodworking, leather crafting and floor installation, which can protect percussion surfaces and reduce working noise. Double detachable faces of the soft hammer are for easy head replacement, and the double embedded design prevents the hammer head from falling out.

Trusted Brand: 5-Piece hammer set provides various choices for you to finish different projects. The strong connection of the hammerhead ensures the hammer is durable and has a long life after being repeatedly hit. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions about WORKPRO 5 PCS hammer set. Your questions will be replied to within 24 hours.

name: Jorgensen 20 oz Straight Claw Hammer with Magnetic Nail Holder, Rip Claw Hammer with Milled Face & Shock Absorbing Grip, Heavy Duty One-piece Forged Hammer
short_description: Efficient and Powerful Strikes: There is a build-in magnetic nail starter for easy one-handed, accurate, and convenient nailing setting. The milled face of this straight claw hammer increase strike accuracy while the 20 oz hammer head adds to strike power. Thus, this framming hammer improves your work efficiency and saves your labor.

Premium Quality: This straight claw hammer is made from one-piece forged and heat-treated carbon steel, making it a solid and secure striking tool. Its single-piece forged construction provides great strength, durability and longevity.

Straight Claw: The rip claw is more suitable for high-strength use. The strong straight claw design is able to effortlessly pull nails, rip apart boards that have been nailed together, and do other demolition work.

Shock Absorbing Grip: The Jorgensen hammer features a shock absorbing grip that absorbs vibration and minimizes fatigue during strikes. Coated with TPR material, the anti-slip handle also ensures a secure and comfortable grip in long-time operation.

Versatile Application: This 20 oz rip claw hammer is a perfect tool for a wide range of tasks in frame work, home repairs, construction work, demolition work, woodworking and so on. It is the ideal and handy hammer for any DIY enthusiast or professional.

Made with high end materials and finishes we guarantee this fiberglass claw hammer for life. The forged carbon steel head polished with a smooth finish to avoid marks on surfaces. Made with a shock absorbing fiberglass the handle is also strong and makes for more comfortable use. Ergo grip design minimizes hand fatigue when using this hammer. Edward Tools 16 oz Claw Hammer with Fiberglass Handle comes with a lifetime warranty.
